project.title: AI personal assistant (M.I.A)
project.some_words:
M.I.A. is an AI assistant for day to day life use. It is written in python currently is in verios Alpha v0.0.1a but it already has many features and many more are comming in the feture.
The project is open source and you can find it in Github along side whith instractions for use.

project.title: Music Downloader
project.some_words:
Music Downloader is a simple python library which allow you to download music easy eather a single song from a link or more than one from a file.
The project is open source and you can find it in Github

project.title: Movies/Series data scraping Api
project.some_words: This api can be found here and you can use the /scrape_id/{name} to get a list of IMDb ids based on the name or the /scrape_id_first/{name} to get only the first id from the results, also there is the /scrape_info/{IMDb id} to get the information for this id or you can use the /scrape_all/{name} to get the id and the info in a single request.

project.title: Encryption Decryption
project.some_words:
Encryption Decryption is a team project with @KDesp73, @congiants and @ThanasisGeorg written in c which can encrypt and decrypt files and text.
The project is open source and you can find it in Github

project.title: Movie Manager
project.some_words: Movie Manager is a team project with @KDesp73 and @ThanasisGeorg written in java which organize your movies and series in one place.
